TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit NumericUpDown extends System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase implements class System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize
Public Class NumericUpDown Inherits UpDownBase Implements ISupportInitialize
type NumericUpDown = class inherit UpDownBase interface ISupportInitialize

summary.span: 代表可顯示數值的 Windows 微調方塊 (也稱為上下按鈕控制項)。

span.span: Represents a Windows spin box (also known as an up-down control) that displays numeric values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A控制項包含單一數值可以遞增或遞減按一下向上或向下按鈕的控制項。A control contains a single numeric value that can be incremented or decremented by clicking the up or down buttons of the control. 除非使用者也可以在值中，輸入屬性設定為`true`。The user can also enter in a value, unless the property is set to `true`. 可以藉由設定格式化的數字顯示， ，或屬性。The numeric display can be formatted by setting the , , or properties. 若要顯示在控制項中的十六進位值，請設定屬性設`true`。To display hexadecimal values in the control, set the property to `true`. 若要顯示千位分隔符號，請在適當時機的十進位數字中設定屬性設`true`。To display a thousands separator in decimal numbers when appropriate, set the property to `true`. 若要指定顯示的數字的小數符號之後，設定要顯示的小數位數的屬性。To specify the number of digits displayed after the decimal symbol, set the property to the number of decimal places to display. 若要指定允許的範圍值控制項，將和屬性。To specify the allowable range of values for the control, set the and properties. 設定值，以指定的值會遞增或遞減至屬性當使用者按一下向上或向下箭號按鈕。Set the value to specify the value to be incremented or decremented to the property when the user clicks the up or down arrow buttons. 您可以增加控制項移動到數字時使用者持續按下向上或向下箭號所設定的速度屬性。You can increase the speed that the control moves through numbers when the user continuously presses the up or down arrow by setting the property. 當或方法會呼叫、 在程式碼上或按一下向上或向下按鈕，在驗證新值和控制項也會更新以新的值，以適當的格式。When the or methods are called, either in code or by the click of the up or down buttons, the new value is validated and the control is updated with the new value in the appropriate format. 具體來說，如果屬性設定為`true`，則方法呼叫之前驗證或更新的值。Specifically, if the property is set to `true`, the method is called prior to validating or updating the value. 值，然後驗證之間並值，和呼叫方法。The value is then verified to be between the and values, and the method is called. 從.NET Framework 4.6 開始將 app.config 檔案包含下列項目時，根據系統 DPI 設定調整控制項的大小：Starting with the .NET Framework 4.6, the control will be resized based on the system DPI setting when the app.config file contains the following entry: ```   ``` ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立並初始化控制設定的某些常見屬性，以及可讓使用者在執行階段變更其中一些屬性。The following code example creates and initializes a control, sets some of its common properties, and allows the user to change some of these properties at run time. 此程式碼假設三控制項放置在表單和處理常式上其事件具現化。This code assumes three controls have been placed on a form and handlers for their events have been instantiated. ， ，並屬性上設定事件的每個核取方塊。The , , and properties are set on the event of each check box. [!code-cpp[Classic NumericUpDown Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic NumericUpDown Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic NumericUpDown Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic NumericUpDown Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic NumericUpDown Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic NumericUpDown Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

[!code-cpp[Classic NumericUpDown Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic NumericUpDown Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic NumericUpDown Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic NumericUpDown Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic NumericUpDown Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic NumericUpDown Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Accelerations As NumericUpDownAccelerationCollection

summary.span: 取得 控制項的排序加速物件之集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of sorted acceleration objects for the control.

value.span: ，包含 控制項的排序加速物件。

span.span: A containing the sorted acceleration objects for the control

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可用來加快與其大量數字，當使用者按住向上或向下箭號，使用鍵盤或滑鼠移動。The property can be used to increase the speed with which the moves through a large set of numbers when the user holds the up or down arrow, either with the keyboard or with the mouse. 設定這個屬性會減少的數目取決於所發生的事件並針對每個指定的屬性值集合中的物件。Setting this property will decrease the number of events that occur depending on the and property values specified for each object in the collection. 集合中包含的物件會依照其屬性。The objects contained in the collection are sorted by their property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. 若要執行此範例中，將下列程式碼貼到表單並呼叫`InitializeAcceleratedUpDown`從表單的建構函式的方法或事件處理方法。To run this example, paste the following code into a form and call the `InitializeAcceleratedUpDown` method from the form's constructor or event-handling method. 執行程式碼時，按下並按住向上或向下箭號以查看發生的加速。While the code is running, press and hold the up or down arrow to see the acceleration occur. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.MiscBugDriven#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.MiscBugDriven/CS/Form1.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.MiscBugDriven#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.MiscBugDriven/VB/form1.vb#6)]

summary.span: 取得或設定在微調方塊 (也稱為上下按鈕控制項) 中顯示的小數位數。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of decimal places to display in the spin box (also known as an up-down control).

value.span: 在微調方塊中顯示的小數位數。

span.span: The number of decimal places to display in the spin box.
The default is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當屬性設定，呼叫方法來更新微調方塊顯示成新格式。When the property is set, the method is called to update the spin box's display to the new format. 適當的小數點符號是由使用者的作業系統地區設定決定。The appropriate decimal symbol is determined by the regional settings of the user's operating system. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立並初始化控制設定的某些常見屬性，以及可讓使用者在執行階段變更其中一些屬性。The following code example creates and initializes a control, sets some of its common properties, and allows the user to change some of these properties at run time. 此程式碼假設三控制項放置在表單和處理常式上其事件具現化。This code assumes three controls have been placed on a form and handlers for their events have been instantiated. ， ，並屬性上設定事件的每個核取方塊。The , , and properties are set on the event of each check box. summary.span: 取得或設定當按一下向上或向下按鈕時，會遞增或遞減微調方塊 (也稱為上下按鈕控制項) 的數值。

value.span: 當按一下微調方塊的向上或向下按鈕時，會遞增或遞減 屬性的數值。

span.span: The value to increment or decrement the property when the up or down buttons are clicked on the spin box.
The default value is 1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 按一下向上按鈕會導致屬性所指定的數量遞增屬性和方法屬性。Clicking the up button causes the property to increment by the amount specified by the property and approach the property. 按一下向下按鈕，會導致屬性所指定的數量遞減屬性和方法屬性。Clicking the down button causes the property to be decremented by the amount specified by the property and approach the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立並初始化控制設定的某些常見屬性，以及可讓使用者在執行階段變更其中一些屬性。The following code example creates and initializes a control, sets some of its common properties, and allows the user to change some of these properties at run time. 此程式碼假設三控制項放置在表單和處理常式上其事件具現化。This code assumes three controls have been placed on a form and handlers for their events have been instantiated. ， ，並屬性上設定事件的每個核取方塊。The , , and properties are set on the event of each check box. span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引發 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 當覆寫衍生類別時，請務必呼叫基底類別方法，讓已註冊的委派收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class' method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項接受唯一數字、 負號、 小數點和編輯按鍵輸入，例如退格鍵。The control accepts only digits, the negative sign, the decimal point, and editing keystrokes, such as BACKSPACE. 如果屬性設定為`true`，接受十六進位數字。If the property is set to `true`, accepts hexadecimal digits.

summary.span: 引發 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 當覆寫衍生類別時，請務必呼叫基底類別方法，讓已註冊的委派收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class' method so that registered delegates receive the event.

summary.span: 將微調方塊 (也稱為上下按鈕控制項) 中所顯示的文字轉換為數值，並加以評估。

span.span: Converts the text displayed in the spin box (also known as an up-down control) to a numeric value and evaluates it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果屬性設定為`true`，顯示的文字會轉換為數值，讓它可以驗證為之間和屬性值。If the property is set to `true`, the text displayed is converted to a numeric value so it can be validated to be between the and property values.

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出在適當的時候是否在微調方塊 (也稱為上下按鈕控制項) 顯示千位分隔符號。

value.span: 如果在適當的時候於微調方塊顯示千位分隔符號則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if a thousands separator is displayed in the spin box when appropriate; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當屬性設定，呼叫方法來更新微調方塊顯示成新格式。When the property is set, the method is called to update the spin box's display to the new format. 適當的千位分隔符號取決於使用者的作業系統地區設定。The appropriate thousands separator is determined by the regional settings of the user's operating system. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立並初始化控制設定的某些常見屬性，以及可讓使用者在執行階段變更其中一些屬性。The following code example creates and initializes a control, sets some of its common properties, and allows the user to change some of these properties at run time. 此程式碼假設三控制項放置在表單和處理常式上其事件具現化。This code assumes three controls have been placed on a form and handlers for their events have been instantiated. ， ，並屬性上設定事件的每個核取方塊。The , , and properties are set on the event of each check box. [!code-cpp[Classic NumericUpDown Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic NumericUpDown Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic NumericUpDown Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic NumericUpDown Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic NumericUpDown Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic NumericUpDown Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當方法呼叫、 在程式碼或按一下向上按鈕，在驗證新值和控制項也會更新以新的值，以適當的格式。When the method is called, either in code or by the click of the up button, the new value is validated and the control is updated with the new value in the appropriate format. 具體來說，如果設定為`true`，稱為之前驗證或更新的值。Specifically, if is set to `true`, is called prior to validating or updating the value. 值，然後驗證之間和值和呼叫方法。The value is then validated to be between the and values and the method is called.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未初始化的微調方塊，目前的值已驗證之間和值，轉換成正確的格式，以便在控制項中顯示。If the spin box is not being initialized, the current value is validated to be between the and values and is converted to the correct format for display in the control.

The numeric value of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當屬性設定，驗證新的值必須介於和值。When the property is set, the new value is validated to be between the and values. 在此之後，呼叫方法以使用適當的格式中的新值更新微調方塊的顯示。Following this, the method is called to update the spin box's display with the new value in the appropriate format. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立並初始化控制設定的某些常見屬性，以及可讓使用者在執行階段變更其中一些屬性。The following code example creates and initializes a control, sets some of its common properties, and allows the user to change some of these properties at run time. 此程式碼假設三控制項放置在表單和處理常式上其事件具現化。This code assumes three controls have been placed on a form and handlers for their events have been instantiated. ， ，並屬性上設定事件的每個核取方塊。The , , and properties are set on the event of each check box. [!code-cpp[Classic NumericUpDown Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic NumericUpDown Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic NumericUpDown Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic NumericUpDown Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic NumericUpDown Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic NumericUpDown Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event ValueChanged As EventHandler

summary.span: 發生於 屬性已經以某種方式變更時。

span.span: Occurs when the property has been changed in some way.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 針對事件發生，藉由按一下向上或向下按鈕，或讓使用者輸入新的值已讀取的控制項，可以在程式碼，變更屬性。For the event to occur, the property can be changed in code, by clicking the up or down button, or by the user entering a new value that is read by the control. 在使用者按下 ENTER 鍵，或瀏覽離開控制項時，會讀取新的值。The new value is read when the user hits the ENTER key or navigates away from the control. 如果使用者輸入新的值，並按一下向上或向下按鈕，事件就會發生兩次。If the user enters a new value and then clicks the up or down button, the event will occur twice. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換具有或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`NumericUpDown1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `NumericUpDown1`. 請確定 與關聯的事件處理常式事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#515](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#515)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#515](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#515)]
